Name: BoxLoop
About the game: BoxLoop is a Platformer MiniPuzzleGame where you have to Decipher each puzzle related to a box color. You Have to Heavily rely on dialog and solve the riddles to progress. The riddles have to be solved relatively fast or the evil box will cause the time to loop again. Solve the mystery of the evil box time loop and save our hero.
